article_title: Behind the scenes as Hamas chose its new leader
sentence: Hamas  attacked  southern  Israel  on  7  October  last  year,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  hostages  back  into  Gaza.

article_title: Behind the scenes as Hamas chose its new leader
sentence: His  brother  Mohammed  leads  the  largest  Hamas  military  battalion,  while  Mohammed  Deif  -  the  elusive  Hamas  veteran  who  led  its  armed  wing  for  two  decades  until  Israel  said  it  killed  him  last  month  -  was  his  neighbour,  friend,  and  classmate.
